titles.title: A bill for the relief of Esidronio Arreola-Saucedo, Maria Elna Cobian Arreola, Nayely Bibiana Arreola, and Cindy Jael Arreola.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1288-1289)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/29/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Esidronio Arreola-Saucedo, Maria Elna Cobian Arreola, Nayely Bibiana Arreola, and Cindy Jael Arreola.
